element.name: goom
element.description: Takes frames of data and outputs video frames using the GOOM filter
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-raw, format=(string)S16LE, rate=(int)[ 8000, 96000 ], channels=(int)1, layout=(string)interleaved; audio/x-raw, format=(string)S16LE, rate=(int)[ 8000, 96000 ], channels=(int)2, channel-mask=(bitmask)0x0000000000000003, layout=(string)interleaved
